articles.title: Queen Elizabeth II Makes Surprise Appearance on Final Day of Platinum Jubilee
articles.description: In a crowning moment for her Platinum Jubilee, Queen Elizabeth II appeared at the balcony of Buckingham Palace Sunday, delighting fans who had hoped to catch a glimpse of her during the final day of festivities marking the monarch’s 70 years on the throne.

articles.title: Rafael Nadal Dominates Casper Ruud To Win French Open
articles.description: On Sunday, Nadal won his record 14th French Open title—and 22nd major championship, the most-ever for a men's player
articles.content:
For Rafael Nadal, there’s no place like home.
